languages.text: "...баный, через колено, хвала Великому..." {n}Взъерошенная Джай пытается отряхнуть вконец испорченный наряд. Бросив на вас взгляд, она прочищает горло и принимает вид невинной овечки.{/n} "Как отрадно сердцу моему видеть, что ты тоже жив{mf||а}, мо{mf|й|я} шерин!"

"...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"
languages.original_text: "...баный, через колено, хвала Великому..." {n}Взъерошенная Джай пытается отряхнуть вконец испорченный наряд. Бросив на вас взгляд, она прочищает горло и принимает вид невинной овечки.{/n} "Как отрадно сердцу моему видеть, что ты тоже жив{mf||а}, мо{mf|й|я} шерин!"

traits.locale_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and assumes the appearance of an innocent little lamb.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight now that I see you too are in one piece, shereen!"

"...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and assumes the appearance of an innocent little lamb.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight now that I see you too are in one piece, shereen!"

"...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and assumes the appearance of an innocent lamb.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

"...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

"...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

languages.text: «... ta madre, que el Exaltado me guarde...». {n}Una Jae desaliñada intenta quitar el polvo a su atuendo arruinado. Carraspea y te mira, adoptando una expresión inocente.{/n} «¡Mi corazón no cabe en sí de gozo al verl{mf|e|a} san{mf|o|a} y salv{mf|o|a}, shereen!».
languages.original_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: «... ta madre, que el Exaltado me guarde...». {n}Una Jae desaliñada intenta quitar el polvo a su atuendo arruinado. Carraspea y te mira, adoptando una expresión inocente.{/n} «¡Mi corazón no cabe en sí de gozo al verl{mf|e|a} san{mf|o|a} y salv{mf|o|a}, shereen!».

languages.text: 「…愚かな私を叱ってください、エグザルテッド・ワンは素晴らしい…」{n}ボロボロのジェイは、汚れた衣装からホコリをはらおうとした。無邪気な表情を浮かべながら、彼女は咳払いをする。{/n} 「あなたが無事で、私の心は喜びでいっぱいです、シェリーン！」
languages.original_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: 「…愚かな私を叱ってください、エグザルテッド・ワンは素晴らしい…」{n}ボロボロのジェイは、汚れた衣装からホコリをはらおうとした。無邪気な表情を浮かべながら、彼女は咳払いをする。{/n} 「あなたが無事で、私の心は喜びでいっぱいです、シェリーン！」

languages.text: “……我的愚蠢，赞美至高无上的神皇……”{n}浑身脏污的婕伊试图掸掉被毁衣服上的灰尘。她清了清嗓子，看了你一眼，随后装出一副傻白甜的表情。{/n}“看到你的安然无恙，我的心里真是充满了喜悦，亲爱的！”
languages.original_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: “……我的愚蠢，赞美至高无上的神皇……”{n}浑身脏污的婕伊试图掸掉被毁衣服上的灰尘。她清了清嗓子，看了你一眼，随后装出一副傻白甜的表情。{/n}“看到你的安然无恙，我的心里真是充满了喜悦，亲爱的！”

languages.text: "... will ich sein, der Erhabene sei gepriesen ..." {n}Eine derangierte Jae versucht, den Staub von ihrer ruinierten Kleidung zu entfernen. Sie räuspert sich, sieht dich an und setzt eine unschuldige Miene auf.{/n} "Mein Herz ist überglücklich, dass auch Ihr noch in einem Stück seid, Shereen!"
languages.original_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: "... will ich sein, der Erhabene sei gepriesen ..." {n}Eine derangierte Jae versucht, den Staub von ihrer ruinierten Kleidung zu entfernen. Sie räuspert sich, sieht dich an und setzt eine unschuldige Miene auf.{/n} "Mein Herz ist überglücklich, dass auch Ihr noch in einem Stück seid, Shereen!"

languages.text: « ... bon sang, grâce soit rendue à l'Exalté... » {n}Échevelée, Jae tente d'épousseter sa tenue ravagée, puis elle s'éclaircit la gorge et vous regarde avant d'affecter une expression innocente.{/n} « Mon cœur déborde de joie à vous voir vous aussi en un seul morceau, shereen ! »
languages.original_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: « ... bon sang, grâce soit rendue à l'Exalté... » {n}Échevelée, Jae tente d'épousseter sa tenue ravagée, puis elle s'éclaircit la gorge et vous regarde avant d'affecter une expression innocente.{/n} « Mon cœur déborde de joie à vous voir vous aussi en un seul morceau, shereen ! »

languages.text: "...Ay anam, Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun..." {n}Jae, darmaduman hâliyle mahvolmuş kıyafetindeki toz toprağı silmeye çalışıyor. Sana bakarken boğazını temizliyor ve masumane bir ifade takınıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, senin de sağ olmana öyle sevindim ki!"
languages.original_text: "...ger me silly, Exalted One be praised..." {n}A dishevelled Jae attempts to dust off her ruined outfit. She clears her throat as she glances at you and puts on an innocent expression.{/n} "My heart overflows with delight to see that you too are in one piece, shereen!"
